description:
Three-section poles with four-season functionality. Take these poles on ski trips, hikes or extended expeditions. FlickLock® adjustment system maximizes clamping and won't slip.

  • Made of durable 100% aluminum
  • Ultra-reliable FlickLock locking mechanism won't slip or loosen over time
  • Updated grips with foam extensions that let you choke up on steep ascents or side hill traverses
  • Hooked grip shape doubles as a lever for adjusting bindings
  • Ergonomic wrist straps are designed for comfort with or without gloves
  • Includes both powder baskets for four-season versatility
name: Black Diamond Expedition 3 Poles
